messages.message: Hey everyone, the file system is briefly not working on localhost or dogfood - will push a fix within the hour, but if you need to use it now, I will post instructions for fixing it jankily in a thread on this message

1. Open the Chrome dev tools
2. Go to the Application tab
3. Expand Local Storage in the sidebar and click the url under it
4. On an empty line add the key `viewSettings` with the value `{"showAllFiles":true}`
